welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mersin, Turkey! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's vibrant culture, rich history, and stunning Mediterranean coastline. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that Mersin has to offer.

restaurants.name: Dede Restoran
restaurants.description: Dede Restoran is a turkish home cooking restaurant located in Mersin.
restaurants.address: Camişerif Mah. 15. Sk. Uray İşh. No:5 Akdeniz (Uray Caddesi), Mersin

restaurants.description: Lokman Usta Kebap Salonu is a kebab restaurant located in Mersin.
restaurants.address: Camişerif Mah. 5234 Sk. Turan Apt. Altı Akdeniz (İstiklal Caddesi), 33060 Mersin
